items.summary: The backend getPublicPosts (or equivalent feed query) must return only posts where visibility is public, sorted strictly by createdAt descending. No ranking score, engagement weight, or any secondary sort criteria may be applied.

CommunityFeedPage must render the feed exactly as returned (public posts, createdAt DESC). Remove any client-side re-sorting, ranking, engagement-based filtering, explore sections, or suggested-posts sections. No metrics (like counts, reaction counts, view counts) should be displayed on feed post cards in this page.
